original_text:
And I will make all my mountains a road,
    and my highways shall be raised up.
korean_text: 내가 나의 모든 산을 길로 삼고 나의 대로를 돋우리니

sentences.original_text: And I will make all my mountains a road
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나의 모든 산을 길이 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: and my highways shall be raised up.
